scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:assets
scripts.build:js: bun build web/src/main.ts --outfile dist/bundle.js --target browser --format esm --minify
scripts.build:assets: cp web/index.html dist/ && cp -r web/css dist/
scripts.build:watch: bun build web/src/main.ts --outfile dist/bundle.js --target browser --format esm --watch
scripts.dev: bun run build && bun run serve
scripts.ci: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run typecheck && bun run format && bun run lint && bun run test && bun run test:e2e
